matador.business_logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador.business_logic.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Provides a Player that is used in a dice game. The Player holds a name, carColor, a Konto and a list of owned fields. Also contains a boolean describing if the player has lost. Provides necessary functions used by the Game class.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen
    See Also:
    Game, Konto

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(String name,
      int carColor,
      int balance)
        Constructs a Player with the provided name, carColor and balance.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Player as a String.
        carColor - int describing the color of this Players car [0:5].
        balance - initial balance of the Players Konto as an int.

      • buyField

        public void buyField(Ownable field)
        Handles processes of buying a Field. Withdraws the price of the field from the players account. Adds bought field to arrayList of players owned fields.
        Parameters:
        field -

      • getOwnedFields

        public List<Ownable> getOwnedFields()
        Returns the ownedFields ArrayList. This ArrayList holds references to all fields owned by the player.
        Returns:
        ownedFields ArrayList

      • isLoser

        public boolean isLoser()
        Returns whether the player har lost the game.
        Returns:
